price: 154. Waxaana kor u soo qaadnay Buurta (Siinaay) oo dul keennay (goortii aan ka qaadeynay) axdigoodii. Waxaan ku nidhi: Gala Albaabka idinkoo sujuudsan. Oo ku nidhi: Ha ku xadgudbinnana arrinka Sabtida. Waxaana ka qaadnay ballan adag.
arabic: وَرَفَعۡنَا فَوۡقَهُمُ ٱلطُّورَ بِمِيثَٰقِهِمۡ وَقُلۡنَا لَهُمُ ٱدۡخُلُواْ ٱلۡبَابَ سُجَّدٗا وَقُلۡنَا لَهُمۡ لَا تَعۡدُواْ فِي ٱلسَّبۡتِ وَأَخَذۡنَا مِنۡهُم مِّيثَٰقًا غَلِيظٗا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: warafaʿnā fawqahumu al-ṭūra bimīthāqihim waqul'nā lahumu ud'khulū al-bāba sujjadan waqul'nā lahum lā taʿdū fī al-sabti wa-akhadhnā min'hum mīthāqan ghalīẓan
